Title: A TelAmerican Horror Story
Writer: Sean Clements, Dominic Dierkes, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: Things get spooky when the guys discover a former employee may be haunting the office.
